bibl.title: English translation [from Spanish] of greeting card from Raquel Romero to [Jefferson Randolph Kean], [n.d.] (See Spanish original)

div1.p: Romero sends a holiday card. [Courtesy of The Albert and Shirley Small Special Collections Library, University of Virginia Library]

div1.head: English translation [from Spanish] of greeting card from Raquel Romero to [Jefferson Randolph Kean], [n.d.] (See Spanish original)
div1.p:
RAQUEL ROMERO
wishes you
a Merry Christmas
and
Happy New Year.
